# Birthday Wishing Website Project

This is a React.js birthday wishing website with interactive arrow animation.

## Features
- Opening page with "sorry" image and click button
- Arrow animation that shoots toward the image when clicked
- Image transition from "sorry" to "happy birthday" message
- Responsive design with smooth animations

## Usage
The birthday wishing website is now running! Click the "Click Here" button to trigger the arrow animation and watch the "sorry" message transform into a "Happy Birthday" celebration.
